title: Surgical treatment of pilonidal disease - Short-term follow up results of minimally invasive pit-picking surgery versus radical excision without suturing: A prospective randomised trial
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Edvinas Dainius, Monika Karolina Vaiciute, Audrius Parseliunas, Tadas Latkauskas, Donatas Venskutonis
